system:
note description: "[ Multiple widget container. Each widget is displayed on an individual page. A tab is displayed for each page allow its selection. Only the selected page is visible. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." appearance: "[ _______ _______ _______ _/ tab_1 \/_tab_2_\/_tab_3_\______ | | | selected_item | | | ---------------------------------- ]" status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "notebook, tab, page" date: "$Date: 2016-09-27 08:50:48 -0700 (Tue, 27 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99192 $"
class interface ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK
create ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
feature -- Access
f_item_text../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_item_textitem_text (an_item: ../interface/ev_widget_short.xmlEV_WIDGET): FalseSTRING_32 -- Label of an_item. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed has_an_item: Falsehas (an_item) ensure bridge_ok: Result.Falseis_equal (../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_i_short.xml#f_item_textitem_text (an_item)) not_void: Result /= Void cloned: Result /= ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_i_short.xml#f_item_textitem_text (an_item)
f_item_tab../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_item_tabitem_tab (an_item: ../interface/ev_widget_short.xmlEV_WIDGET): ../interface/ev_notebook_tab_short.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB -- Tab associated with an_item. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed has_an_item: Falsehas (an_item) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void
feature -- Status report
f_selected_item../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_itemselected_item: detachable ../interface/ev_widget_short.xmlEV_WIDGET -- Page displayed topmost. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed item_is_selected: not Falseis_empty ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_i_short.xml#f_selected_itemselected_item
f_selected_item_index../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_item_indexselected_item_index: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Index of ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_itemselected_item. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_i_short.xml#f_selected_item_indexselected_item_index
f_tab_position../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Position of tabs. -- One of ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_leftTab_left, ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_rightTab_right, ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_topTab_top or ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_bottomTab_bottom. -- Default: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_topTab_top require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_i_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position
f_pointed_tab_index../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_pointed_tab_indexpointed_tab_index: FalseINTEGER_32 -- index of tab currently under mouse pointer, or 0 if none. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure result_valid: Result >= 0 and Result <= ../interface/ev_dynamic_list_short.xml#f_countcount
f_tab_index_at_screen_position../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_index_at_screen_positiontab_index_at_screen_position (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Index of tab currently at screen position (a_x, a_y), or 0 if none. ensure result_valid: Result >= 0 and Result <= ../interface/ev_dynamic_list_short.xml#f_countcount
feature -- Status setting
f_position_tabs_top../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_position_tabs_topposition_tabs_top -- Display tabs at top of Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure tab_position_set: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_topTab_top
f_position_tabs_bottom../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_position_tabs_bottomposition_tabs_bottom -- Display tabs at bottom of Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure tab_position_set: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_bottomTab_bottom
f_position_tabs_left../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_position_tabs_leftposition_tabs_left -- Display tabs at left of Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure tab_position_set: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_leftTab_left
f_position_tabs_right../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_position_tabs_rightposition_tabs_right -- Display tabs at right of Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure tab_position_set: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_rightTab_right
f_set_tab_position../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_set_tab_positionset_tab_position (a_tab_position: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Display tabs at a_tab_position. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_position_within_range: a_tab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_leftTab_left or a_tab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_rightTab_right or a_tab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_bottomTab_bottom or a_tab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_topTab_top ensure tab_position_set: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = a_tab_position
f_select_item../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_select_itemselect_item (an_item: ../interface/ev_widget_short.xmlEV_WIDGET) -- Display an_item above all others. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed has_an_item: Falsehas (an_item) ensure item_selected: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_itemselected_item = an_item
feature -- Constants
f_tab_left../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_leftTab_left: FalseINTEGER_32 = 1 -- Value used to position tab at left.
f_tab_right../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_rightTab_right: FalseINTEGER_32 = 2 -- Value used to position tab at right.
f_tab_top../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_topTab_top: FalseINTEGER_32 = 3 -- Value used to position tab at top.
f_tab_bottom../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_bottomTab_bottom: FalseINTEGER_32 = 4 -- Value used to position tab at bottom.
feature -- Element change
f_set_item_text../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_set_item_textset_item_text (an_item: ../interface/ev_widget_short.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_text to label of an_item. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed has_an_item: Falsehas (an_item) a_text_not_void: a_text /= Void ensure item_text_assigned: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_item_textitem_text (an_item).Falsesame_string_general (a_text) cloned: ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_item_textitem_text (an_item) /= a_text
invariant tab_position_within_range: ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_leftTab_left or ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_rightTab_right or ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_bottomTab_bottom or ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_positiontab_position = ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_tab_topTab_top selected_item_not_void: ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and not Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_itemselected_item /= Void selected_item_index_within_range: ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and not Falseis_empty implies (../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_item_indexselected_item_index >= 1 and ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_item_indexselected_item_index <= ../interface/ev_dynamic_list_short.xml#f_countcount) selected_item_index_zero_when_empty: ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_item_indexselected_item_index = 0 selected_item_is_i_th_of_selected_item_index: ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and not Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_itemselected_item = ../interface/ev_dynamic_list_short.xml#f_i_thi_th (../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_item_indexselected_item_index) selected_item_index_is_index_of_selected_item: ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and not Falseis_empty implies attached ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_itemselected_item as l_selected_item and then ../interface/ev_notebook_short.xml#f_selected_item_indexselected_item_index = ../interface/ev_dynamic_list_short.xml#f_index_ofindex_of (l_selected_item, 1)
